function.name: convert_currency
function.description: Convert an amount from one currency to another.
function.long_description: Converts a monetary amount between two currencies using live exchange rates retrieved from an external finance API.

from_currency.description: Source currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, INR)

to_currency.description: Target currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, INR)

example_user_queries: How much is 50 EUR in USD?
What is the exchange value of 200 GBP in USD?
Convert currency from USD to JPY
How much is 75 euros in rupees?
Currency conversion from CAD to USD
